title: Tiny Commando
resume: Richard Carlyle was an elite Navy SEAL, until a tragic military experiment left him four inches tall and out of a job. That's when he found Mitzy McNeil, an Ivy League whiz and crack detective. Now, they solve crimes and battle the super villain Cesar Pequeno using totally cool tiny vehicles and a cube van.
